short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automate trading across multiple Tradovate windows

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Efficiently manage trades across multiple Tradovate SuperDOM windows with this streamlined trading assistant. Perfect for traders who are trading multiple prop firms eval accounts simultaneously.

Features:
• Execute market orders across multiple windows with a single click
• Individual or synchronized trading across all windows
• Customizable window names for easy identification
• Option to use exchange-set quantities or custom quantities

Setup Requirements:
• One SuperDOM per chart window
• One chart window per trading account

Usage Notes:
• Extension works exclusively with SuperDOM trading panel
• Execute market buy/sell orders and exits
• Trade delay can be adjusted to prevent overload

Important:
This extension interacts only with the SuperDOM buy/sell/exit market buttons.
Users are responsible for managing their positions, ensuring proper setup, and complying with platform terms of use.
Always verify trade execution and maintain proper risk management.
